display_long_description:
Blast off into Ruffnauts: Planet Pals, a creature-collecting, gadget-blasting, loot-grabbing VR sandbox where every planet is alive with mayhem.

Catch & train wild pets, master ridiculous gadgets, and explore spherical worlds that reward creativity, chaos, and friendship.

Whether solo or with your crew, the universe is your playground and the laws of physics are optional.

Why Players Love Ruffnauts:

[media]

🐾 Catch, Feed, and Evolve Chaos-Creatures
Throw your Capture Cube to collect 100+ creatures  from robotic critters to flying dragons. Feed them tacos, evolve them into monsters, and ride them into glorious chaos.

[media]

🌍 Planets = Playgrounds
Climb trees, bounce on sheep, glide between floating islands each spherical planet is a new biome full of loot, traps, and surprises.

🔫 Gadgets That Break the Rules
Launch yourself with a Power Fist, pull friends off cliffs with a Grapple Gun, or drop portals into lava. Every tool is made to mess with physics and your friends.

🎮 Sandbox Mayhem with Friends
Join 10 player lobbies and battle, explore, or build chaos your way with creatures, gadgets, or pure creative nonsense.

[media]

🌀 Weekly Drops
New creatures. New gadgets. New chaos. Every week.
